name: TIDDAC
description:
Top-down shooter made on December 2017 as my first entry for #onegameamonth challenge. Is an experiment about putting the player on the mindset of a person with an addiction-prone personality using well known gameplay mechanics (in this case top-down shooter).

TIDDAC is a small, fast-paced shooter to play in 30-60 second bursts

------------------------------------------
